settings.text:
Join the community!

Share your passion for cycling, and discover the numerous advantages and benefits reserved for you.

settings.code:
JOIN THE LIMAR

CYCLING CLUB

{% if shop.locale == 'it' %}
Entra nella community!
Condividi la tua passione per il ciclismo, e scopri i numerosi vantaggi e benefit a te riservati.

ESSERE MEMBRO DEL LIMAR CYCLING CLUB SIGNIFICA:

– Ricevere l’esclusivo sconto 50% su ordini uso personale con codice ri- servato.
– Ricevere un ulteriore codice sconto 30% da condividere con i tuoi mi- gliori amici: sui loro acquisti, tu avrai diritto al 10% di sconto in merce.
– Per ogni tuo acquisto è prevista la spedizione gratuita.
{% else %}
Join the community!

Share your passion for cycling, and discover the numerous advantages and benefits reserved for you.

Being a member of the Limar Cycling Club means:

– Receive the exclusive 50% discount on orders placed on the Limar Web Shop for products for personal use with a reserved code.

– Receive an additional 30% discount code to share with your best friends: on their purchases, you will be entitled to a 10% discount on merchandise.

– Free shipping is provided for each of your purchases.

{% endif %}

{% if shop.locale == 'it' %}

ENTRA A FAR PARTE DI UN TEAM DAVVERO UNICO!


Scegli il kit Limar cycling club tra le proposte esclusive ed acquistalo ad un prezzo imperdibile.
Prenotabile sin da ora, disponibile a partire da giugno 2024.

SCEGLI IL TUO KIT PREFERITO!

{% else %}

BECOME PART OF A TRULY UNIQUE TEAM!


Choose LIMAR CYCLING CLUB KIT among exclusive proposals and buy it at an unmissable price.
Bookable now, available from June 2024.

CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE KIT

{% endif %}

Kit 01. PH-INK IN BLUE

– Racing Kit LIMAR by Nalini, limited edition only for the Limar Cycling Club, consisting of a summer jersey and short bibs in a color matching the helmet.

– AIR ATLAS Ph-ink helmet in blue, from the brand new SPOTLIGHT ON STYLE collection

– CRUZ transparent light gray glasses, new entry of the EYEWEAR 2023 collection

*The size will be defined in the order confirmation phase: Clothing: XS, S, M, L, XL sizes Helmet: S, M, L sizes

Kit 02. BELIEVE IN TURQUOISE

– LIMAR by Nalini Racing Kit, limited edition only for the Limar Cycling Club, consisting of a summer jersey and short bibs in a color matching the helmet.

– AIR ATLAS Believe helmet in turquoise, from the brand new SPOTLIGHT ON STYLE collection

– CRUZ transparent watermarine glasses, new entry of the EYEWEAR 2023 collection

*The size will be defined in the order confirmation phase: Clothing: sizes XS, S, M, L, XL Helmet: sizes M, L

settings.title: JOINING THE LIMAR CYCLING CLUB OFFERS OTHER INCREDIBLE ADVANTAGES.

settings.text: We have invited some industry partners to offer our club opportunities, promotions and offers.

{% if shop.locale == 'it' %}

ESSERE MEMBRO DEL LIMAR CYCLING CLUB TI OFFRE L’OPPORTUNITÀ DI CONDIVIDERE ESPERIENZE UNICHE E INCONTRARE NUOVI AMICI

Ecco la selezione degli eventi e social bike ride per il 2024 per pedalare insieme:

– ETAPE DU TOUR, PARMA, 27/28 APRILE
– BERGHEM MOLAMIA, BERGAMO, 15/16 GIUGNO
– PROSECCO CYCLING, VALDOBBIADENE, 29 SETTEMBRE
– JEROBOAM GRAVEL FRANCIACORTA, 19 OTTOBRE

{% else %}

BEING A MEMBER OF LIMAR CYCLING CLUB GIVES YOU THE OPPORTUNITY TO SHARE UNIQUE EXPERIENCES AND MEET NEW FRIENDS.

Here is the selection of events and social bike rides for 2024 to ride together:

– ETAPE DU TOUR, PARMA, APRIL 27/28
– BERGHEM MOLAMIA, BERGAMO, JUNE 15/16
– PROSECCO CYCLING, VALDOBBIADENE, SEPTEMBER 29
– JEROBOAM GRAVEL FRANCIACORTA, OCTOBER 19

{% endif %}

{% if shop.locale == 'it' %}

JENTRARE A FAR PARTE DEL LIMAR CYCLING CLUB OFFRE ALTRI INCREDIBILI VANTAGGI

WE PRESENTIAMO I NOSTRI PARTNER E LE LORO OFFERTE ESCLUSIVE VALIDE PER IL 2024:

– NALINI SCONTO ESCLUSIVO
– NORTHWAVE SCONTO ESCLUSIVO 30%
– FSA SCONTO ESCLUSIVO 20%
– VISION SCONTO ESCLUSIVO 20%
– ENERVIT SCONTO ESCLUSIVO 30%
– EEVYE SCONTO ESCLUSIVO 25%

L’ISCRIZIONE AL LIMAR CC INCLUDE LA TESSERA ACSI INDIVIDUALE GRATUITA

E’ Obbligatorio il certificato di idoneità sportiva agonistica in corso di validità.
Al momento dell’iscrizione al Limar Cycling Club, riceverai una mail di benvenuto con tutte le indicazioni per usufruire di queste interessanti promozioni.

{% else %}

JOINING THE LIMAR CYCLING CLUB OFFERS OTHER INCREDIBLE ADVANTAGES.

WE PRESENT OUR PARTNERS AND THEIR EXCLUSIVE OFFERS VALID FOR 2024:

– NALINI EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT
– NORTHWAVE EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT 30%
– FSA EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT 20%
– VISION EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT 20%
– ENERVIT EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNT 30%
– EEVYE DISCOUNT EXCLUSIVE 25%


REGISTRATION WITH LIMAR CC INCLUDES THE FREE INDIVIDUAL ACSI CARD

A valid certificate of competitive sports suitability is mandatory.

When registering with the Limar Cycling Club, you will receive a welcome email with all the information on how to take advantage of these interesting promotions.

{% endif %}

Registration with Limar CC includes the FREE INDIVIDUAL ACSI CARD

A valid certificate of competitive sports suitability is mandatory.

When registering with the Limar Cycling Club, you will receive a welcome email with all the information on how to take advantage of these interesting promotions.
